garden.description: Garden data if user type is garden

dister.description: Dister data if user type is dister or if garden user has assigned dister (directly or via country ownership)

post.summary: Change password for the authenticated user
post.description: Change password for the authenticated user (admin or garden). Requires current password, new password, and password confirmation.
Send OTP code to user's email for password reset.
Reset password using email, OTP code, new password and confirmation.

get.description: Get current authenticated user information with the same format as login response

garden.description: Garden data if user type is garden

dister.description: Dister data if user type is dister

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all child cards with their associated group and person type information. Supports filtering by search (child's or parent's name fields), phone, status, group_id, person_type_id, parent_code.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in child's and parent's name fields

post.description: Create a new child card with the provided information

group_id.description: ID of the associated garden group

parent_code.description: Optional parent access code (auto-generated if not provided)

value.description: License value (boolean for boolean type, date string for date type)

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific child card

put.description: Update an existing child card with new information

group_id.description: ID of the associated garden group

parent_code.description: Optional parent access code (auto-generated if not provided)

value.description: License value (boolean for boolean type, date string for date type)

patch.description: Update only the parent verification status of a specific card
Update only the license information of a specific card

value.description: License value (boolean for boolean type, date string for date type)

patch.description: Update only the status of a specific card

post.summary: Regenerate card code and reset parent verification
post.description: Generate a new random 6-character code for the specified card and set parent_verification to false
Restore a deleted card by setting deleted to false

delete.description: Permanently delete multiple child cards by their IDs

post.description: Upload a new image for the card. If an image already exists, it will be replaced.

post.summary: Move multiple cards to a different group
post.description: Move multiple cards to a different garden group by providing an array of card IDs and a new group ID

card_ids.description: Array of card IDs to move

403.description: Forbidden - Group does not belong to user's garden

message.example: Group does not belong to your garden

post.description: Send OTP to the phone number associated with a card

phone.description: Phone number associated with the card

post.description: Verify OTP and return all cards associated with the phone number if valid

phone.description: Phone number associated with the card

post.description: Authenticate a card using phone number and automatically send OTP

phone.description: Phone number associated with the card

get.description: Download an Excel report of cards. Optionally filter by card IDs. If dister is logged in, export is restricted to their assigned gardens.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Comma-separated card IDs or multiple ids[] query params

get.description: Get card data using token authentication and optional phone validation

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: Phone number to validate against the authenticated card

message.example: Phone number does not match authenticated card

get.description: Retrieve a list of all cities with their country information

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific city

put.description: Update an existing city with new information

get.description: Retrieve a list of all countries with their tariffs. Supports filtering by name and pagination.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific country

put.description: Update an existing country with new information

get.description: Retrieve a list of all devices. Supports filtering by name, status, garden_id. Pagination supported with default 15 items per page.

from.description: First item number on current page

to.description: Last item number on current page

post.description: Create a new device for a garden. garden_groups is an array of group IDs. Code will be auto-generated.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific device.

put.description: Update an existing device. garden_groups is an array of group IDs.

delete.description: Delete a specific device by ID.

patch.description: Update only the status of a specific device

post.description: Generate a new random 6-character code for the specified device

get.summary: Get cards associated with a device
get.description: Retrieve all cards that belong to the garden groups associated with this device. Pagination supported with default 15 items per page.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in child's and parent's name fields

from.description: First item number on current page

to.description: Last item number on current page

post.summary: Create a new card for a device
post.description: Create a new card that will be associated with the garden groups of this device.

get.summary: Get a specific card for a device
get.description: Retrieve a specific card that belongs to the garden groups of this device.

post.description: Authenticate a device using its unique code and return device information
